monogr.author: Sophocles
monogr.title: The Antigone of Sophocles. Edited with introduction and notes by Sir Richard Jebb.

respStmt.name: EM, Scott Ettinger and Roger Travis

change.item: Text scanned at U. Chicago in 1988. Basic SGML tagging by EM, Scott Ettinger and Roger Travis.
Final check of cardbreaks, tags, and linenumbers.
Check text against TLG Sophocles in order to discover if there are any missing whole words or lines..
changed attribution of ll. 49-68 to Ismene.
Added speaker tags where they were missing.
added a period at line 17 and a raised dot at line 72

Converted to XML

Revision 1.13  2003/07/01 22:18:08  yorkc
Updated texts to TEI P4 and Perseus P4 extensions; minor cleanup (esp. character encodings and typos.)

Revision 1.12  2003/05/21 20:29:16  lcerrato
changed e)s to w(s on line 463 confirmed by source

Revision 1.11  2000/10/27 14:14:57  amahoney
fix a couple of stray typos

Revision 1.10  2000/09/14 16:57:45  lcerrato
changed etos eis tos to etos eis etos at line 340

Revision 1.9  2000/06/08 17:48:58  lcerrato
fixed two typos reported by users: one on line 370 (mht vs mh); one on line 411 (parwn instead of pagwn)

Revision 1.8  2000/03/04 20:35:17  dasmith
Added separate funder entity to TEI header.

Revision 1.7  2000/02/15 23:18:01  amahoney
use n attribute on sp element to carry over the speaker name when
the speech is interrupted by a card break;  this also requires that
the card break at the end come after the close of the sp, not within

Revision 1.6  1999/11/24 21:12:07  amahoney
Bring remaining files up to new DTD;  use part=i and part=f for
antilabe in all files
